editor.label: Resource - @PLUGIN_KEY@ Cleanup
editor.description: Delete ElectricCommander resources and optionally destroys the virtual machines on the ESX server.

formElement.label: ESX Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine to cleanup.

formElement.label: Number of VMs:
formElement.documentation: Number of virtual machines to cleanup (default is 1). If the value is greater than 1, a suffix is added to VM names. The suffix consists of an underscore and the VM number ('_#').

formElement.label: Delete VM?:
formElement.documentation: If checked, the virtual machine will be destroyed.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
